contents.text: I am writing to make a complaint  about your poor postal service which puts me in a very difficult position.

I am a second year student in Liaoning University. Two months ago my mother sent me a parcel packed in a nylon bag from Beijing, which contains some winter clothes: a black overcoat, a brown sweater, and a pair of gloves. But two months has passed, I still have not received my  parcel yet, I have to spend extra money on winter clothes as I can hardly stand the cold weather here.
I sincerely hope that you will give prompt attention to my case and settle it properly as soon as possible. I am looking forward to your favorable reply.
